title: Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: When the view, such as the Navigator, is resized smaller, the two tool items move below the label instead of staying on the same line. This causes a usability problem as users are accustomed to the close button being on the same line as the label and located on the far right corner.
OB: When resizing the view, the tool items move below the label.
EB: The tool items should stay on the same line as the label, regardless of the size of the view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application on Linux.
2. Go to the Navigator view.
3. Resize the view to make it smaller.
4. Observe that the tool items move below the label.
